message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a price of $12,000. I believe it offers significant value at this price point. What do you think?
Hi Alice, I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,000. I'm willing to pay a premium, but I'm on a tight budget. Can you meet me in the middle at $9,000?
Hi Bob, thanks for the offer. I understand your budget constraints, but $9,000 is too low for me.  How about we meet halfway between our previous offers at $10,500?
Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $10,500 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $9,500, but that's as high as I can go. Can you consider that price?
